name: Knife Fight
description:
Welcome to the training ground! Let's see if you know how to handle knives and other blades in your hands.

You will play in 3 different game modes:

- Hitting the ground
- Hitting the moving target
- Hitting the wall and climb yourself to the top
Along the way, you will collect coins which you will use them to buy new knives, blades, and swords.

Let's go now!
